title: Inclusive Design Lab at CHI 25
news: We congratulate several lab members and alum on their CHI publications: Clepper et al. (with Findlater and McDonnell), Goodman et al. (with McDonnell), Jiang et al., Jiang et al., Huffman et al. (with Mack).

title: Congratulations to Dr. Goodman!
news: Dr. Steven Goodman successfully defended his dissertation, titled â€˜Human-Centered Sound Recognition Tools for Deaf and Hard of Hearing Users.' Congratulations to Dr. Goodman!

title: Inclusive Design Lab at ASSETS '24
news: Our student Lucy Jiang and lab alum Emma McDonnell (co-virtual chair of ASSETS) will be attending ASSETS in person. Be sure to check out their papers (Jiang and Gualano et al. and McDonnell et al.)! Student Gina Clepper (virtual student volunteer) and postdoc Avery Mack will be attending virtually. You can find Avery's paper here (Mack et al.).

title: Congratulations to Dr. McDonnell!
news: Dr. Emma McDonnell successfully defended her dissertation, titled 'Understanding, Designing, and Theorizing Collective Access Approaches to Captioning-Mediated Communication.' Dr. McDonnell will be moving on to the role of National Library of Medicine Postdoctoral Fellow in Biomedical Informatics and Medical Education at the University of Washington School of Medicine this fall.

title: Inclusive Design Lab at CHI '24
news: Current PhD students Lotus Zhang and Emma McDonnell and incoming PhD student Lucy Jiang will present papers at CHI 2024, discussing visual privacy and video accessibility for blind and low vision people, TikTok captioning, and experiences of ableism on social media.
